member.name: D2D1_2DAFFINETRANSFORM_PROP
member.summary: Identifiers for properties of the 2D affine transform effect.

summary.para: The interpolation mode used to scale the image. There are 6 scale modes that range in quality and speed.
The mode used to calculate the border of the image, soft or hard.
The 3x2 matrix to transform the image using the Direct2D matrix transform.

member.name: D2D1_2DAFFINETRANSFORM_PROP.D2D1_2DAFFINETRANSFORM_PROP_SHARPNESS
member.summary:
In the high quality cubic interpolation mode, the sharpness level of the scaling filter as a float between 0 and 1. The values are unitless. You can use sharpness to adjust the quality of an image when you scale the image. The sharpness factor affects the shape of the kernel. The higher the sharpness factor, the smaller the kernel.
Note This property affects only the high quality cubic interpolation mode.Type is FLOAT.
Default value is 1.0f.
